name: costco-receipt-downloader
description: Browser extension to download Costco receipts

scripts.build: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean:firefox && cp manifest-firefox.json manifest.json && npm run zip:firefox && rm manifest.json
scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean:chrome && cp manifest-chrome.json manifest.json && npm run zip:chrome && rm manifest.json
scripts.zip:firefox: mkdir -p dist && zip -0 dist/costco-receipt-downloader-firefox.xpi manifest.json content.js styles.css
scripts.zip:chrome: mkdir -p dist && zip -r dist/costco-receipt-downloader-chrome.zip manifest.json content.js styles.css

author: Harry Ho
